video.title: Pokémon: Indigo League
video.synopsis: Explore the world of Pokémon with 10-year-old Ash Ketchum and his partner, Pikachu, as they aim for Ash's ultimate goal: becoming a Pokémon master.

episodes.synopsis: After oversleeping on the day he's to choose his Pokémon, 10-year-old Ash Ketchum is stuck with the only one remaining: a strong-willed Pikachu.
episodes.title: Pokémon - I Choose You!

episodes.synopsis: Viridian City is on high alert for thieves like Jessie, James and Meowth of Team Rocket, a group of bad guys dedicated to stealing valuable Pokémon.
episodes.title: Pokémon Emergency

episodes.synopsis: Ash catches a Caterpie, the first Pokémon he's ever caught! But Misty is grossed out by it and repulsed by its attempts to be friends with her.
episodes.title: Ash Catches a Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: When a battle involving Ash's Metapod is interrupted by an angry swarm of Beedrill, Ash flees but leaves his Metapod behind.
episodes.title: Challenge of the Samurai

episodes.synopsis: Jessie, James and Meowth dig a trap for our heroes, but they end up falling into it themselves.
episodes.title: Showdown in Pewter City

episodes.synopsis: After being rescued by Ash and pals, a grateful scientist leads them to find the storied Moon Stone, which is said to increase the power of Pokémon.
episodes.title: Clefairy and the Moon Stone

episodes.synopsis: In Cerulean City, three gym leaders turn down Ash's challenge, but then a fourth, mysterious gym leader steps in to take up the battle.
episodes.title: The Water Flowers of Cerulean City

episodes.synopsis: Ash hears of A.J., fierce Pokémon trainer who has never lost a match. Full of confidence, Ash heads directly for A.J.'s gym to find his new opponent.
episodes.title: The Path to the Pokémon League

episodes.synopsis: At the Pokémon Technical Institute, Ash and Misty challenge a conceited girl who is the ringleader of a bullying training system at the school.
episodes.title: The School of Hard Knocks

episodes.synopsis: The party discovers a quiet, hidden town inhabited by Pokémon that have been injured in battle or abandoned by their trainers.
episodes.title: Bulbasaur and the Hidden Village

episodes.synopsis: After saving an abandoned Charmander from a Spearow attack, our heroes are rewarded for their good deed when they find themselves in trouble.
episodes.title: Charmander - The Stray Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: After making a deal with Meowth, a group of Squirtle is able to capture Ash, Misty, Brock and a wounded Pikachu, who needs medicine.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Squirtle Squad

episodes.synopsis: The party comes across a lighthouse belonging to a researcher who is awaiting the coming of a one-of-a-kind Pokémon, never before seen by humans.
episodes.title: Mystery at the Lighthouse

episodes.synopsis: For Pikachu to compete against Raichu, a Pokémon with tremendous electric power, it must demonstrate a stronger will in battle than ever before.
episodes.title: Electric Shock Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and James have a plan to lure Pokémon trainers, including Ash and his friends, onto a fancy cruise ship and steal their Pokémon.
episodes.title: Battle Aboard the St. Anne

episodes.synopsis: Shipwrecked with Team Rocket, our heroes are forced to team up with their long-standing enemies to survive a submerged and sticky situation.
episodes.title: Pokémon Shipwreck

episodes.synopsis: After surviving the sinking ship, the teams are dragged into another perilous situation when they are attacked by the atrocious Pokémon Gyarados.
episodes.title: Island of the Giant Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: The teams meet a wealthy lady who wants to turn an island's coral reef area into a resort, but a school of Tentacool interferes with the construction.
episodes.title: Tentacool & Tentacruel

episodes.synopsis: The teams find a town where legend has it that the ghost of a girl who lived long ago steals the spirit of a young man during a local summer festival.
episodes.title: The Ghost of Maiden's Peak

episodes.synopsis: Smitten with a pink Butterfree, Ash's Butterfree battles Team Rocket with the strength and courage of a Pokémon in love.
episodes.title: Bye Bye Butterfree

episodes.synopsis: The party arrives in Saffron City, where gym leader Sabrina commands Pokémon that use psychic powers. If Ash defeats her, he'll earn his fourth badge.
episodes.title: Abra and the Psychic Showdown

episodes.synopsis: In search of a Ghost-type Pokémon, Ash heads for Pokémon Tower in Lavender Town, where they are said to dwell.
episodes.title: The Tower of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Our friends journey to battle the powerful psychic gym leader Sabrina in Saffron City, where Ash has only one goal in mind: to win the Marsh Badge.
episodes.title: Haunter Vs. Kadabra

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes encounter a wild Pokémon that, if offended, can go into mad fits of rage. Underestimating its unpredictability, Ash tries to catch it.
episodes.title: Primeape Goes Bananas

episodes.synopsis: After criticizing a perfume in a department store, Ash discovers the scent is produced in the local gym, where he's denied entry for his remarks.
episodes.title: Pokémon Scent-Sation!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes come to a town where a large number of children have gone missing and sick Pokémon are not responding to treatment at the Pokémon Center.
episodes.title: Hypnos Naptime

episodes.synopsis: At Brock's persistent request, our heroes stop by Scissor Street, a place famous to Pokémon breeders for its Pokémon beauty salons.
episodes.title: Pokémon Fashion Flash

episodes.synopsis: Brock and Ash agree to help the daughter of a trainer who has abandoned his family in order to train day and night for victory at the P1 Grand Prix.
episodes.title: The Punchy Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: During a power outage in Gringey City, Ash and friends discover the Pokémon Magnemite and a host of Grimer, a kind of Pokémon created from sludge.
episodes.title: Sparks Fly for Magnemite

episodes.synopsis: A foreman overseeing the construction of a dam is recruiting Pokémon trainers because the burrowing Pokémon Diglett are interfering with his project.
episodes.title: Dig Those Diglett!

episodes.synopsis: At the Fuchsia Gym, Ash's mission to win his next badge is held up by a complex system of traps, and then a concealed female trainer challenges him.
episodes.title: The Ninja Poké-Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Ash takes the place of an injured rancher's daughter in an annual race to measure the growth of everyone's Pokémon.
episodes.title: The Flame Pokémon-Athon!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes accompany Officer Jenny into the forest, intent on pursuing the Pokémon poachers in the area.
episodes.title: The Kangaskhan Kid

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the others happen upon a town that can only be reached by a long bike bridge, but they don't have enough money to rent bikes for the crossing.
episodes.title: The Bridge Bike Gang

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes take shelter in a cabin that turns out to be the Copycat House of a trainer who has a Pikachu that is a Ditto, the Transform Pokémon.
episodes.title: Ditto's Mysterious Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the others discover a group of wild Pikachu in a secluded area of the woods. How will Pikachu feel seeing others of its kind in the wild?
episodes.title: Pikachu's Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: A lost Eevee leads the team to a huge home with a lavish party in full swing, attended by the trainers of Pokémon that evolve using Evolution stones.
episodes.title: The Battling Eevee Brothers

episodes.synopsis: In return for a meal, Ash, Misty, and Brock agree to investigate a town's mysterious water shortage.
episodes.title: Wake Up Snorlax!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes travel to Dark City, where the gym leaders try to battle any traveling Pokémon trainers they find within the town limits.
episodes.title: Showdown at Dark City

episodes.synopsis: After discovering there's a traveling carnival nearby, Ash, Misty and Brock join in the fun of the fair and stumble across a rather dull magic show.
episodes.title: The March of the Exeggutor Squad

episodes.synopsis: After falling ill and being healed by a girl named Cassandra, Meowth vows to pay her back. But will the rest of Team Rocket be so eager to help her?
episodes.title: The Problem with Paras

episodes.synopsis: After finding a Jigglypuff that has trouble with singing, Misty puts aside her idea of catching it and promises to find a solution to its problem.
episodes.title: The Song Of Jigglypuff

episodes.synopsis: Ash decides to join in an excavation of fossils from extinct Pokémon as a chance to beat Gary, who's also at the paleontological dig site.
episodes.title: Attack Of The Prehistoric Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: While at the Pokémon Center seeking treatment for Pikachu, Ash learns from Nurse Joy that there's been an accident, and many Pokémon are injured.
episodes.title: A Chansey Operation

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes are walking in the countryside, they notice a missing persons poster of a familiar face: It looks exactly like James from Team Rocket.
episodes.title: Holy Matrimony!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and Misty both vow to catch a rare wild Farfetch'd, and soon they get their chance when the Wild Duck Pokémon appears.
episodes.title: So Near, Yet So Farfetch'd

episodes.synopsis: Jessie, James and Meowth turn their sights on Ash's Pokémon Egg and begin hatching another daring plan to make it theirs.
episodes.title: Who Gets To Keep Togepi?

episodes.synopsis: After Bulbasaur's bulb begins to emit an odd glow, a nurse runs some tests and discovers that Bulbasaur isn't sick: It's getting ready to evolve!
episodes.title: Bulbasaur's Mysterious Garden

episodes.synopsis: After accidentally making his way onto a training ground for the police force's Growlithe, Ash asks if he and Pikachu can join in on the training.
episodes.title: The Case Of The K-9 Capers

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends meet the only known photographer to get a picture of a real Aerodactyl, which turns out to be the same one that abducted Ash!
episodes.title: Pokémon Paparazzi

episodes.synopsis: Ash signs up for the Pokémon League Admissions Exam, where Jessie and James begin putting everyone through a very different kind of test.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Test

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the gang discover that a new breeding center is a cover for a diabolical scheme by Team Rocket's new members, Butch and Cassidy.
episodes.title: The Breeding Center Secret

episodes.synopsis: Ash and Brock allow Misty to use their Pokémon when she has to compete against Jessie at the Queen of the Princess Festival.
episodes.title: Princess vs. Princess

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends arrive at a small school on Kids Day. One of the children believes Meowth is the Pokémon who had once saved him from a Beedrill.
episodes.title: The Purr-fect Hero

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Brock and Misty are approached by a strange character speaking only in riddles. Once they find the gym, Ash and Pikachu fight a spitfire Pokémon.
episodes.title: Riddle Me This

episodes.synopsis: Ash continues his quest to attain his Volcano Badge once he finally locates the gym that is suspended above a pool of molten lava.
episodes.title: Volcanic Panic

episodes.synopsis: As Ash and the gang are rushing to catch the last ferry off of Cinnabar Island, they stumble upon a rare Pokémon in trouble.
episodes.title: Beach Blank-Out Blastoise

episodes.synopsis: One of Misty's water Pokémon is in need of exercise, so the gang decides to take her Horsea to a gym that's run by her sisters in Cerulean City.
episodes.title: The Misty Mermaid

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Brock and Misty get sidetracked when all of their belongings mysteriously disappear. The group gets caught up in an out-of-this-world encounter.
episodes.title: Clefairy Tales

episodes.synopsis: Ash hopes to earn his Earth Badge, but he arrives at the gym just in time to see his rival, Gary, being defeated by a never-before-seen Pokémon.
episodes.title: The Battle of the Badge

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Brock and Misty encounter a runaway Mr. Mime. Ash disguises himself as a Mr. Mime in an attempt to lure it back to its trainer.
episodes.title: It's Mr. Mime Time

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the gang must decide whether to climb a steep and dangerous mountain that will take them even deeper into the woods.
episodes.title: Snow Way Out!

episodes.synopsis: Professor Oak tries to explain to Ash and Gary that instead of being so competitive with each other they should try to learn from each other.
episodes.title: Showdown at the Po-ké Corral

episodes.synopsis: Ash joins his mom on a vacation to Seafoam Island, where he seeks the programmer of the Pokedex to get information about the evolution of a Slowpoke.
episodes.title: The Evolution Solution

episodes.synopsis: To remain in top shape for the Pokémon League, Ash decides to try surfing. He meets a surfer who tells him about a legendary wave.
episodes.title: The Pi-Kahuna

episodes.synopsis: Ash and friends meet Florinda, who works at the local nursery. She's afraid her Gloom is not evolving because she isn't training it properly.
episodes.title: Make Room for Gloom!

episodes.synopsis: A famous director comes to town to film a movie featuring Pokémon, so Ash, Brock, Misty and Team Rocket fight hard to make their own Pokémon the star.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Quack-tion!

episodes.synopsis: The gang heads to Hollywood for the premiere of "Pokémon in Love," and Meowth is forced to look back on his painful past.
episodes.title: Hollywood Heartbreak / Go West Young Meowth

episodes.synopsis: With only three weeks left before the Pokémon League competition, Ash, Brock and Misty head up Mount Hideaway to find one of the Elite Four Trainers.
episodes.title: To Master the Onixpected

episodes.synopsis: Ash and Brock inadvertently uncover a hidden temple containing Pokémon fossils. Could they have stumbled upon the ancient city of Pokémopolis?
episodes.title: The Ancient Puzzle of Pokémopolis

episodes.synopsis: On their way to the Pokémon League Tournament, Ash, Brock and Misty run into another trainer who's had all of his Pokémon Badges stolen.
episodes.title: Bad to the Bone

episodes.synopsis: On the day before the Pokémon League Tournament, Team Rocket once again tries to spoil the moment when they attempt to steal the flame of the Moltres.
episodes.title: All Fired Up!

episodes.synopsis: It's day one of the Pokémon League Tournament! Ash's first battle will be held on the Water Field, but he goes against the advice of his coaches.
episodes.title: Round One - Begin!

episodes.synopsis: In between matches, Ash drops off his Pokémon at the Pokémon Center. Team Rocket takes the opportunity to make one more attempt at stealing Pikachu.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: Ash meets his toughest opponent yet: Jeanette from Crimson City, who uses a power Scyther and brings a whole cheering section with her.
episodes.title: The Fourth Round Rumble

episodes.synopsis: Ash becomes fast friends with Richie, another trainer who is competing in the tournament and also has a Pikachu. Together, they fight Team Rocket.
episodes.title: A Friend in Deed

episodes.synopsis: A twist of fate pits Ash and Richie against each other in the fifth round of the Pokémon League Competition. Can their friendship survive?
episodes.title: Friend and Foe Alike

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Misty and Brock are in the stands cheering for their new friend, Richie, at the sixth-round match, when an unfortunate turn of events happens.
episodes.title: Friends to the End

episodes.synopsis: After battling in the Pokémon League Tournament, Ash and his friends return to Pallet Town, where Professor Oak asks them to go on another journey.
episodes.title: Pallet Party Panic

episodes.synopsis: After learning that it takes a month to get to Valencia Island, Ash wins a blimp ride so it will take only a day! But it isn't as easy as it seems.
episodes.title: A Scare in the Air

episodes.synopsis: On Valencia Island, Brock realizes Professor Ivy and her group of scientists are Pokémon breeders, so he considers staying to continue his studies.
episodes.title: Pokéball Peril

episodes.synopsis: Double-crossed by Team Rocket again while heading home on a blimp, Ash and Misty crash-land in the middle of nowhere and meet a new friend, Tracey.
episodes.title: The Lost Lapras

episodes.synopsis: Ash sets out to qualify for the Orange League Tournament. Facing one of the toughest trainers in the Orange Crew, Ash must rely heavily on Squirtle.
episodes.title: Fit to Be Tide

episodes.synopsis: Just as Ash, Misty and Tracey set foot on Mandarin Island, Pikachu and Togepi turn against them and join a group of other angry Pokémon.
episodes.title: Pikachu Re-volts

episodes.synopsis: On Sunburst Island, a sister and brother ask Ash and his friends about the Crystal Onix. Curious, the gang helps the siblings find and capture it.
episodes.title: The Crystal Onix

episodes.synopsis: Tracey's Pokemon-watching skills are tested, while Ash's attempts at observing lead to trouble for both his friends and a feisty pink Rhyhorn.
episodes.title: In the Pink

episodes.synopsis: On an uninhabited island where a fossilized Kabuto's been discovered, a series of natural disasters suddenly place our heroes in mortal danger.
episodes.title: Shell Shock!

episodes.synopsis: Misty meets another female trainer who's an expert on water Pokémon. The new trainer notices some signs that Misty's Psyduck may be ready to evolve.
episodes.title: Bye, Bye Psyduck

episodes.synopsis: While Ash and his friends travel among small islands with Nurse Joy, they learn a lot about Pokémon and Joy's very special friendship with a Magikarp.
episodes.title: The Joy of Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: A second Orange Islands trainer puts Ash and his Pokémon through a battery of difficult tests. Are their skills up to the challenge?
episodes.title: Navel Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: It looks like someone's stealing from the groves of giant grapefruit on the Grapefruit Islands, so Ash and his friends try to help catch the thieves.
episodes.title: Snack Attack

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Tracey and Misty are excited to see an ancient Orange League Championship trophy that's on display in a museum. But Team Rocket beats them to it.
episodes.title: A Shipful of Shivers

episodes.synopsis: When an island's natives mistake Meowth for a legendary creature with special powers, he decides to play along but can't quite fulfill expectations.
episodes.title: Meowth Rules!

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Tracey and Misty reach an island famous for its bug-type Pokémon. Misty must overcome her fear of bugs when the trio finds an injured Scyther.
episodes.title: Tracey Gets Bugged

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the gang discover an island loaded with different types of fruit trees and decide to take a day off. But Team Rocket's still after Pikachu.
episodes.title: A Way Off Day Off

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Trovita Island, our heroes come across two Pokémon trainers who seemingly hate each other, even though their two Pokémon are in love.
episodes.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Pokémon?

episodes.synopsis: The gang spots a swarm of circling Magnemite gathering electricity from lightning. Ash tries to corral them to help with a nearby power outage.
episodes.title: Git Along, Little Pokémon

episodes.synopsis: Ash and the group are on their way to Trovita Island and the next Orange League gym when they learn about a sort of monster living in a town's sewer.
episodes.title: The Mystery Menace

episodes.synopsis: The Trovita Island Gym Leader whom Ash is determined to beat falls in love with Misty. Ash must push aside his jealousy in order to win the battle.
episodes.title: Misty Meets Her Match

episodes.synopsis: After Trovita Island, Ash and his friends stop at a place with a reputation for super-sized Pokémon. But they soon fall for a Team Rocket trick.
episodes.title: Bound for Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Tracey and Misty run into another Pokémon trainer wanting to battle Ash. Ash has a breakthrough with Charizard during the battle.
episodes.title: Charizard Chills
